CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
This test verifies editor's "Goto Matching Bracket" behavior, which is triggered via Ctrl-M shortcut.

function MyClass(a, b)
{
    console.log("Test");
}


Running: testSingleCursorFromOutsideOpenBracket
function.MyClass(a,.b)|
{
....console.log("Test");
}


Running: testSingleCursorFromInsideOpenBracket
function.MyClass(a,.b|)
{
....console.log("Test");
}


Running: testSingleCursorFromOutsideCloseBracket
function.MyClass(a,.b)
|{
....console.log("Test");
}


Running: testSingleCursorFromInsideCloseBracket
function.MyClass(a,.b)
{|
....console.log("Test");
}


Running: testMulticursor
function.MyClass(|a,.b)|
{|
....consol|e.log("Test");
}
